changeSet.sql: -- -- data package table and index -- CREATE TABLE dp_dataset ( dataset_key uuid NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY REFERENCES dataset(key) ON DELETE CASCADE, endpoint_key integer NOT NULL REFERENCES endpoint(key) ON DELETE CASCADE, metadata JSONB NOT NULL, modified timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now() ); CREATE INDEX dp_metadata_idx ON dp_dataset USING GIN (metadata);
